node.title: These are the stores that will be closed on Thanksgiving
node.description: More retailers are giving workers the holiday off, although a handful will be open for early Black Friday shopping.
node.content: ["Most major retailers will be closed again this Thanksgiving, a pandemic shift\u00a0that began last year after years of stores being open on the holiday for early Black Friday shopping.\u00a0", "The lengthy tally of stores that will be shuttered on Thursday includes Best Buy, JCPenney, Kohl's, Macy's, Target and Walmart. (Full list below.)\u00a0", "After closing its stores last year to curtail crowds during the pandemic, Target this year decided to make the holiday closure permanent. The move by many consumers to online shopping may have made the decision easier.\u00a0", "\"What started as a temporary measure driven by the pandemic is now our new standard \u2014 one that recognizes our ability to deliver on our guests' holiday wishes both within and well beyond store hours,\" Target CEO Brian Cornell wrote in a note to employees, which was emailed to CBS MoneyWatch.", "Apple, Costco, Home Depot, Lowe's and Nordstrom have long stayed shut on Thanksgiving, while Target, up until last year, had stayed open on Thanksgiving for a decade.", "States including Maine, Massachusetts and Rhode Island require most stores to be closed on Thanksgiving.", "Some grocery stores will be open on Thursday, often with reduced hours.\u00a0", "The following stores will be closed on Thanksgiving, according to The BlackFriday.com:\u00a0", "Stores open on Thanksgiving:\u00a0", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
